To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private TimeProfile _tp;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_tp = TP(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_tp.IsReady)
{
    var volumePerPrice = _tp.VolumePerPrice.Value;
    var profileHigh = _tp.ProfileHigh.Value;
    var profileLow = _tp.ProfileLow.Value;
    var pOCPrice = _tp.POCPrice.Value;
    var pOCVolume = _tp.POCVolume.Value;
    var valueAreaVolume = _tp.ValueAreaVolume.Value;
    var valueAreaHigh = _tp.ValueAreaHigh.Value;
    var valueAreaLow = _tp.ValueAreaLow.Value;
    var current = _tp.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.tp = self.TP(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.tp.IsReady:
    volume_per_price = self.tp.VolumePerPrice.Value
    profile_high = self.tp.ProfileHigh.Value
    profile_low = self.tp.ProfileLow.Value
    p_o_c_price = self.tp.POCPrice.Value
    p_o_c_volume = self.tp.POCVolume.Value
    value_area_volume = self.tp.ValueAreaVolume.Value
    value_area_high = self.tp.ValueAreaHigh.Value
    value_area_low = self.tp.ValueAreaLow.Value
    current = self.tp.Current.Value
